name: K.O.
Guard
note:
<Action Start: 1>
<Hide Turns>

<Help Description>
Unit receives less \dmg until unit uses an action
</Help Description>

<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  var members = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
  var totalGuarding = 0;
  for (var i = 0; i < members.length; ++i) {
    var member = members[i];
    if (member && member.isStateAffected(stateId)) {
      totalGuarding += 1;
    }
  }
  if (totalGuarding >= 4) {
    var reduction = 0.65;
  } else if (totalGuarding >= 3) {
    var reduction = 0.60;
  } else if (totalGuarding >= 2) {
    var reduction = 0.55;
  } else {
    var reduction = 0.50;
  }
  value -= Math.floor(value * reduction);
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: Enemy Passive
note:
<Custom Confirm Effect>
if (value !== 0 && this.item() && this.item().damage.variance > 0) {
  var bonus = 0;
  if (!this.isForDeadFriend()) {
    bonus = Math.abs(value);
    var levelmultiplier = 3 * Math.pow(1.01, user.level);
    bonus += user.level * levelmultiplier.clamp(3, 50);
    if (target.isGuard()) {
      bonus /= 2;
    }
  }
  if (bonus) {
    if (value > 0) {
      value += bonus;
    } else if (value < 0) {
      value -= bonus;
    }
  }
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

  allowedStates.push(41, 42, 43, 46);

    }
  }
}

    var extraTargets = 4;

      var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
      if (member) {
        member.startAnimation(77);
        member.gainHp(-Math.ceil(damage * member.elementRate(elementId)));
        member.startDamagePopup();
        member.clearResult();
        members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
        if (member.isDead()) {
          member.performCollapse();
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</Custom Confirm Effect>

name: Greater Undead
note:
<Custom Passive Condition>
condition = !user._undeadDeath;
</Custom Passive Condition>

<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isHpRecover()) {
  value = Math.abs(value);
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
if (target.hp <= 0) {
  var elements = this.getItemElements();
  var killingElements = [7, 13];
  var killed = false;
  while (killingElements.length > 0) {
    var elementId = killingElements.shift();
    if (elements.contains(elementId)) {
      killed = true;
    }
  }
  if (killed) {

name: Stormflurry
note:
<Category: Enchant>
<Help Description>
For \c[4]5\c[0] turns, if unit uses \c[4]Volt\c[0] skills, unit has a \c[4]20%\c[0] chance to strike an additional time for \c[4]40%\c[0] of damage dealt; This effect can chain off itself
</Help Description>

<Custom Establish Effect>
var skills = [];
var skillTypes = [];
// Insert the skills this passive can be used with.
skills.push(681, 689, 697, 705, 713, 719);
// Insert the skill types this passive can be used with.
skillTypes.push(18);

if (this.isSkill() && (skills.contains(this.item().id)) || skillTypes.contains(this.item().stypeId)) {
  if (target && target.result() && target.result().hpDamage > 0) {
    var originalResult = JsonEx.makeDeepCopy(target._result);
    target.clearResult();
    var extraDmg = Math.ceil(0.40 * originalResult.hpDamage);
    var successRate = 0.20;
    var struck = 0;
    var maxHits = 5;
    for (;;) {
      if (target.isAlive() && Math.random() < successRate) {
        struck += 1;
        target.gainHp(-extraDmg);
        target.startDamagePopup();
        if (target.isDead()) {
          target.performCollapse();
        }
        target.clearResult();
        if (struck >= maxHits) {
          break;
        }
      } else {
        break;
      }
    }
    if (struck > 0) {
      target.startAnimation(5);
    }
    target._result = originalResult;
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

var paramId;
while (result.length > 0) {

  if (!user.isMaxBuffAffected(paramId)) {

}

var result = allowedParams.slice();

if (paramId !== undefined) {

  }
}

while (result.length > 0) {

name: Chaos Deflector
note:
<Category: Enchant>
<Help Description>
For \c[4]5\c[0] turns, when unit takes direct \dmg, \c[4]80%\c[0] chance to divert the \dmg up to unit's \c[4]DEF\c[0] or \c[4]RES\c[0] (whichever is higher) to any number of random teammates evenly with diverted \dmg
</Help Description>

<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  var successRate = 0.80;
  if (Math.random() < successRate) {
    var allies = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
    if (allies.length > 1) {
      allies.splice(allies.indexOf(target), 1);
      var max = Math.min(allies.length, 4);
      var min = 1;
      var totalTargets = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1) + min);
      while (allies.length > totalTargets) {
        allies.splice(Math.floor(Math.random() * allies.length), 1);
      }

      var redirectedDamage = Math.min(value, Math.max(target.def * 4, target.mdf * 4));
      redirectedDamage = Math.ceil(redirectedDamage / totalTargets);
      value = value - redirectedDamage;

      while (allies.length > 0) {
        var member = allies.shift();
        if (member) {
          member.gainHp(-redirectedDamage);
          member.startDamagePopup();
          member.startAnimation(2);
          if (member.isDead()) {
            member.performCollapse();
          }
          member.clearResult();
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>
